TopicTitle: Project Arctic Film- Be Part Of Something Great

Articles.Content:
CAN I POST ONE FREAKING THING WITH OUT SOMEONE BEING DOWNER ABOUT IT????? YES IT IS A SPECIAL EFFECTS PROGRAM, I WAS UNDER THE IMPRESSION THAT A PROJECT LIKE THIS NEEDED SPECIAL EFFECTS??? NO?

sorry but I have had the worst Christmas of my freaking life and every time I make a post SOMEONE has to come up and say its not good enough or call me an idiot, maybe I should just leave the project cause I am clearly not wanted here.

CAN I POST ONE FREAKING THING WITH OUT SOMEONE BEING DOWNER ABOUT IT????? YES IT IS A SPECIAL EFFECTS PROGRAM, I WAS UNDER THE IMPRESSION THAT A PROJECT LIKE THIS NEEDED SPECIAL EFFECTS??? NO?

sorry but I have had the worst Christmas of my freaking life and every time I make a post SOMEONE has to come up and say its not good enough or call me an idiot, maybe I should just leave the project cause I am clearly not wanted here.

Wowowowowowowow there, calm down. I never treated you like an idiot, and I never EVER said I or anybody else didn't want you on this project.

You are more than welcomed here, and the point I was making is that you were talking about video editing when you brought up After Effects. This lead me to the conclusion that you misunderstood AE's goal; not that you are an idiot not capable of understanding how a VFX program is different from a editing program.

Also you bring up a good point there: the VFXs. I said earlier that I could take on that part of the project, but more than one person is welcomed. And Yes, I think VFXs are much needed here on this project.

I just made my largest plane to date. Scratch that, my largest CRAFT do date! Would this be of any use? It has no cargo hold but it could still be used as such.

Landing the laggy Behemoth... Largest Mk3 plane to date.

Sorry, put the wrong time, the writing session is 11am tomorrow!

Sorry, put the wrong time, the writing session is 11am tomorrow!

It says you posted this at 10:46 AM. What time toes it read for you? I'm in PST and I want to match time zones correctly.

18:46, I'm on GMT

Aww 3:00 again...
Sorry, best time most people should be able to do.
Scriptwriting time!

I just realized that I would have needed to get up at about 4:00 AM to make the scriptwriting session, which is why I missed it

Oh, and the closest thing I could find to a proper script was Avera9eJoe's Google Doc, which doesn't look as if it has anything new on it.

So, what changes have been made?
Sorry I missed it, my alarm on my phone didn't go off, so i completely forgot

Sorry I've seemingly forgot about this, I've just been really busy IRL.

So, what's going on in terms of production?

Maybe there should be a writing session for those of you in Europe/Asia/Australia AND one for those in the Americas?

Like say a session in a time slot exactly eleven hours from when I posted this (I posted this at 11:ooam so meaning a session that would would start at 10:00pm for me and I think 11:00pm for upsilon).

Hello!

I'm interested in joining, so here's my application (with some extra useful info).

Name: BriXman or Brix

Country: Sweden

Timezone: GMT +1

Job(s): Builder and Script writer

Why I want this job: I like the story in the movie, and I want to contribute to it, and I can make rovers/cars and aircraft pretty good.

Previous experiences: I am founder and leader of the community company B.R.I.Xco, building craft for almost a year soon. I also have a Youtube channel, with gameplay videos of various games. (Link in my signature)

Additional comments: If you need someone making posters and logos and such, I'm up for the job.

Don't we already have enough members? We have about 40.

I was the only person that turned up, i didn't want to make any changes without people being there, so nothing has changed, as of my knowledge. (FIRST POST OF 2015 SON.)
